author: bergmeister
body:
Originally spotted on the official docs website [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.management.automation.completionresult.-ctor?view=powershellsdk-1.1.0#System_Management_Automation_CompletionResult__ctor_System_String_).
The `listItemText` parameter has a typo: since it says: `he text to be displayed in a list`

As part of this I also made sure that all comment start with an upper case and added periods at the end of all comments in this file.

On a minor note: The `Edit` button on the official docs website [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.management.automation.completionresult.-ctor?view=powershellsdk-1.1.0#System_Management_Automation_CompletionResult__ctor_System_String_) is not working.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@bergmeister Thanks for your contribution!

Could you please check the remaining `///<summary>` comments? I see some ones can be corrected too.

title: XML documentation fix for CompletionResult
